title: Hookhand Mariner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Green) each night.
- (1): Attack a player each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If no Gatherers use any abilities other than Generate in a night, you will become 2002B Riphook Raider after the night ends.

desc:
